      Request used to delete a scheduled job

      Request used to retrieve the overall status of a scheduled job

      Request used to retrieve the status of any set of SMS messages

      Request used to get the overall status of a job
      class  SMSStatusRange
      Request used to retrieve the status of all SMS messages sent in a given time interval.
